text: Khwe (also rendered Kxoe, Khoe; or ) is a dialect continuum of the Khoe family of Namibia, Angola, Botswana, South Africa, and parts of Zambia, with some 8,000 speakers. ==References== Category:Languages of South Africa Category:Languages of Namibia Category:Languages of Angola Category:Languages of Botswana Category:Languages of Zambia
title: Khwe language
